item.title: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi hospitalized after injury in Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was hospitalized after sustaining an injury while traveling with a congressional delegation in Luxembourg.

item.title: S&P 500 falls slightly Friday, on track for a losing week: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 ticked lower on Friday, putting it on pace for its first weekly decline in four weeks.

item.title: Europe stocks close lower, snap three-week winning streak; UK and German data disappoints
item.description: European markets ended lower Friday as investors reacted to data prints from two of the region's largest economies.

item.title: Elon Musk reveals SEC sent him 'settlement demand' after Twitter buyout probe
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a "settlement demand" to Elon Musk, the tech billionaire revealed in a social media post on Thu...

item.title: Who got it right and wrong on Wall Street in their 2024 stock market outlook
item.description: Original year-end forecasts for the S&P 500 ranged from 4,200 at JPMorgan Chase to 5,200 at Oppenheimer. All of them were wrong.
